title: Lost my Metal State After my Friend Landed These 2 hooks
body:
https://gfycat.com/JealousBrokenArgentinehornedfrog


https://gfycat.com/WelllitForcefulIrishwolfhound

Riot games whatever I did I'M SORRY

replies.body: I hate it when I lose my *Metal* State too.
Oh wow lol wtf I didn't even realize I did that
That's pretty bad tbh... like it's not even close especially on the 2nd one..
Thresh's hook clearly hits your anchor in both clips, so he got you fair and square. After that, it's simply centering the tether animation.
Clean up the boxes boys, dat shits broke.

Rito really hates their tanks dont they


I joke...

Also remember all skill shots have a bubble at the end of their range.  If you were that far to the right but not at max range, he'd have missed.
Right at max range on any skill shot is the hardest place to be to avoid being hit.
